nodes.text: The Class-L cargo container was a polyhedral spheroid-shaped freight container manufactured by Xizor Transport Systems and designed to be carried by freighters such as a Pursuer-class starship. The container was used to store cargo during transit in both realspace and hyperspace. The container was designed with the cargo linkage systems of both the cargo tanker and cargo freighter in mind, though its shape allowed a versatility in transporting usage.
